text: Thinking this might be a bug with the Batch Update API....it works for the regular update but batch seems to now
Are the new “Deal Tags” exposed in the API at all?
I was expecting them to be on the Pipeline endpoints
Interesting, guess we know it's coming but hopefully won't have to wait too long for them to release it.  Appreciate the feedback.
yeah I'll do a little checking and see which beta it is and if I can get you guys in
So people are using beta versions in live instances?  Or just in sandbox accounts?
oh lots of people enroll betas on live accounts
betas go through alpha tests before rolling out but they are still subject to change
but you'll be notified about any changes before they happen
interesting.  yeah, that would be cool

Hello Everyone I am currently using the API below.

```crm/v4/objects/{object_type}/{object_id}?associations=company&associations=notes&associations=emails ```
The Docs have been removed and I am unable to find them anywhere.

The docs were contained within the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/associations> under the "association endpoint" tab at the bottom.

Could anyone tell me where they have moved. If anyone has found them?
Hey guys, I have a question. Is it possible to change the status of a quote? I want to change the hs_payment_status to PAID but it seems that is not possible.
Hey <@U01QVR44MEY>, Do you by chance have any idea on this?
<@U01QVR44MEY> <@UD53A9UUR> Hi! Thanks for your help last time. This was fixed for several months but as of yesterday we are getting identical errors. Did something change again?

Once again you can see it using this <https://app.HubSpot.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=cdfcf3a5-6702-4135-b040-d46245f807bc&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Foauthdebugger.com%2Fdebug&scope=crm.schemas.contacts.read&response_type=code&response_mode=form_post&state=ipyz3vbduxs&nonce=2jh8wclw975|link> in a new private tab. It has a state provided in it. The state does not get returned if you are logging in for the first time.
